name: etc/issue
body:
### oh hai
I like shells, not seashells or cshells, more bash shells :)

```
$ touch "Karl_Fischer"
$ ln -s "Karl_Fischer" kmf
$ whoami kmf
```

I like to fiddle and tinker, if I have an itch I like to scratch ... I rarely take code and write from scratch.

### seriously
My name is Karl, I stay in South Africa, Pretoria to be exact.
I love Open Source and Free\Libre Software, Follow me here or on Twitter [@kmf](http://twitter.com/kmf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
